Package com.google.ortools.sat

Interface LinearArgument

All Known Subinterfaces:
LinearExpr, Literal
All Known Implementing Classes:
AffineExpression, BoolVar, ConstantExpression, IntVar, LinearExprBuilder, NotBoolVar, WeightedSumExpression
public interface LinearArgument
A object that can build a LinearExpr object.

This class is used in all modeling methods of the CpModel class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    LinearExpr
    build()
    Builds a linear expression.
